name: DREAM DISC (mindfungus)
description:
press anywhere
pull back to power your shot
release to fling the dream disc

bounce through beautiful spaces
hit the bumpers to succeed
shots you don't take are collected as points

400 hand-crafted rooms
25 themed collections
calming synths and dreamy recordings
full of challenging shots to make

a game by:
Peter Rockwell
Kira Boom
Cody Walker
Nicolás Muñoz

music and sound by:
Michael Langiewicz

based on our Ludum Dare 39 jam entry
